website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for rugged snow boots that provide reliable warmth and traction for a reasonable price, this is a pair to consider.
pros: Durable construction without  too much bulk or weight
Faux fur lining adds to the warmth and comfort
Hook-and-loop closures make them easy for kids to put on and fasten
Built-in snow cleats help gain traction in icy conditions
cons: Sizes may run a bit small for some, especially boys with wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Boots with build-in ice-cleats, yes please
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my son in size 13 (he is 5 years old with bug feet). Sizing is correct. They are warm, waterproof and stylish. The Velcro helps him to get in the boots easy. They are lined all through with cozy fake fur. But what us surprised, was the built-in ice-cleats on the bottom back of the shoe. I must say, the most genius idea ever. Living in AK and having icey roads all through the winter, this is the best feature ever. Wish they would make these for adults as well. My daughter wants the same boots now too.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Best boot weve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome! For starters they are cheaper than even walmart snow boots. My favorite feature is the metal cleat in the back. Keeps him steady on ice and I dont wory about him falling. The cleat is gental enough for my wood and tile floors too....no marks and he has hardly taken them off except to dry the past 4 months. They keep his feet warm and dry. Best boots we've ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Snow boots
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a 10-10.5 but I always go up a size for snow boots for extra socks or suit stuffing and got these in 11.5. He says they are comfortable and just wore them outside for the first snow of the season. They seem great soft faux fur on the inside and the ice cleats are pretty cool. For $20 I think it’s a good deal. Easy to get on/off and appear high quality. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: cocokru

customer_reviews.title: cozy winter sneaker boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are easy for my son to get on and off. Love velcro! They have and interesting feature, a little claw teeth metal thing to pull out when its icy and snowy to prevent slipping. Kinda cool. Don't think they have a picture of this feature , but it's nice. Also, the fur goes all the way inside to the toe, so it might be good to size up half a size. I would recommend this product and I didn't receive a discount for my review.
customer_reviews.author: lia rivette

customer_reviews.title: my son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: we live at 6,700 ft in the mountains of Wyoming. our weather varies so much I needed a double duty boot for rain/snow that wasn't going to overheat or underheat my sons feet. he played in these for 2 hours in about 8 inches of snow and when he came in his socks were still dry and his feet weren't sweaty. his boots were wet on the outside but dried quickly! ours did not come with the pick attached at the bottom which is fine. I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, warm, light! Bought my son 8 years he likes me too!!! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Т

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These are absolute junk. I'm shocked by all the 5 star reviews! They're paper thin, stiff-crinkly plastic outer with the thinnest layer of fur on the inside. The top portion is very wide and open, it will not keep snow out. The bottom is very narrow with a thick sole, but I cannot imagine that they'd be warm at all given the structure of the rest of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: brookemc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, warm, snow cleats on big kid sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fur lining in the boots, easy to get on and off, and can't beat them for this price! We ordered two pairs, one for each of my kids. The size 12 little kids has no snow cleat. The size 3 does have the snow cleat. I'm assuming this is because little ones could get hurt. It's very sharp! It could do some damage if the stepped on another kids foot or hand while playing in the snow... but it's also great for walking on ice. Very happy with these! Fit as expected! I'm considering getting some for myself. :)
customer_reviews.author: L.E.W.

customer_reviews.title: The black ones don't have ice picks!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a size 2. I ordered a 2.5, and they fit PERFECT. They come in a Ziploc looking bag. I thought they'd be squashed, but they weren't. I ordered the black ones. The entire inside of the boot is lined in very soft faux fur. The tread on the bottom is great! The only thing I was disappointed with, was that they didn't have the ice picks like the other customers received... They don't include that part in the description, probably because not all colors have them. Bummer. But, on the plus side, they have some terrific tread on the bottom! Very happy with these. Would have given 5 stars if it actually had the ice picks.
customer_reviews.author: Beepbeep

customer_reviews.title: Wide open at the top; Not secure.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not good if you want to keep your feet from getting wet. The top area where you would secure the boot is horrible! My 9 yr old was irritated as his sock was down around his toes because of the lack of boot security around the calf. I left these with the local Goodwill when we left the Mt. Shasta area.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Borcalli

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm but not for the rain
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots and insists in wearing them snow or shine. They kept his feet warm for our ski trip but when he wore them in the rain back home, the inside got wet. They may be waterproof for the snow but not the rain which is why I took of a star. Maybe remove waterproof from the description
customer_reviews.author: Devin Swanson

customer_reviews.title: DRY and WARM
customer_reviews.text: These boots work for our 2 year old grandson perfectly. He wears a size 8 and we ordered size 8.5 and they fit great. He has played out when it was 20 degrees and snowy and they kept his feet warm. Today it was wet and slushy and his feet were dry after playing out for over an hour. The velcro works great and they are easy to adjust over his snow pants. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Durable, perfect fit, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son perfectly. He loved them. They look really good. I was impressed with how durable they were. And the inside is very soft. They are great for keeping my sons feet warm through the winter. He said they were very comfortable. I also like that it has the metal grip that can unfold from the bottom of the sole to keep from slipping on ice. Would definitely reccomend them to anyone looking for decent snow boots for their child. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie and Joshua Gough

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boots
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this boots. My son used these last year in bitter chicago cold. The only issue is the velcro stickers are way to sticky which is a good thing for grown ups but for kids it might be harder at times since if they dont stick the side flap correctly things around them like winter hat and scarf tends to stick on the shoes and u will see ur kid dragging his wardrobe on his shoe hehehe. I m returning this unfortunalty because of this issue. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jamaia

customer_reviews.title: Durable and warm
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn these for 4-5 months of winter so far and never complains about cold feet. If he steps in a deep puddle they do leak a little, but that’s not usually an issue in our cold climate. They’ve lasted a solid winter, so for the price, I’m pleased. We live in a very snowy place, but temps are usually in the teens and twenties, so I don’t know if they’re insulated enough for colder climates.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Larkspur

customer_reviews.title: Great boot very warm and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit my 4 1/2 year old son perfectly. He loves wearing them. Easy to slip on, super comfy and very warm. I love that the insulation goes from the top of the inside of the boot to the toes. We live in Idaho and it gets into the -20 degree weather some days but he hasn’t complained about cold feet. I was sad some of the reviews showed some cleats on the bottom but the one we bought didn’t have it, I guess that’s a feature from the past cuz the reviews were older that mentioned that feature. Over all when he grows out of these boots I’ll order another pair without question.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: No ice cleat! So disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: Received these without the built in ice clear. Has anyone else received them this way? I would hate to exchange and receive the same problem. So many reviews talk about the ice cleat
customer_reviews.author: GeekMom

customer_reviews.title: Really like these but runs way too big
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our son when we had a lot of snow but he was unable to wear them because they are way too big. I decided to keep them as he should be able to wear them next winter. If you order these maybe order down 1 or 1 1/2 size smaller than what you normally get?
customer_reviews.author: JessicaDawnMcgregor

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am totally surprised at how great these boots were. I was happy to find my 5yo son something that wasn’t stiff like a duck boot. This boot feels more like a sneaker but has the added protection of the claw on the bottom to help while walking in ice, as well as the added comfort and warmth of the fleece inside. They fit as expected. I am going to buy these every year now!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Soft lining inside!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my son. He grew out of his old shoes from last year and since this was a great price, I thought that I would try these. Although we have not used them in snow, I think that they will be okay. I like the soft lining inside the shoe and like how easy they are to put on and take off. I even considered getting myself a pair! My son was happy with the color and the overall appearance of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Size up one size! Wow wee, supa warm!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm boots. My son overheats in these boots if he wears them inside. He can play in knee high snow in these boots and come inside with sweaty feet! *You should buy a size up bc the inside is so fuzzy, it makes for a snug fit, especially if you wear wool blend socks. My son wears a 6, but the 7 with socks is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Beardhole Hambleton

customer_reviews.title: I like'em
customer_reviews.text: We are still waiting on snow here in southeastern Michigan so I can't contest to how the boots perform in the snow but on cold days playing outside our grandson never complained of his feet being wet or cold. So far boots are holding up well. The boots stay on his feet and probably best of all they are quick and simple to put on and take off..
customer_reviews.author: Joe Vago

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: These boots seem nice, but my son was slipping all over the snow (no traction), also when I went to take them off, there was a lot snow bunched up where the boot closes. His feet were warm and dry, but I think if we were out in the snow a little longer his feet would have started to get wet. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Iamgadgetman

customer_reviews.title: The perfect boots for SMO braces
customer_reviews.text: My son wears orthopedic braces on his feet which makes buying shoes a challenge. I'm pleased to say that these boot more than met & surpassed my expectations. Not only do his braces fit perfectly in them, it's also amazingly easy to get them on/off him. Will definitely be buying these for him yearly
customer_reviews.author: Katie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son immediately put these boots on and wouldn't take them off for nearly 3 days straight whenever we were going out somewhere. He absolutely loves the fit and comfort. With the cold winters, he can wear them when he's going out in the snow or if it's just a normal cold day. They're very easy to put on and off by himself which saves time when trying to get out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Small
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 years old and wears a size 10 or 10.5 in every shoe brand. I purchased him these boots in size 11 and he couldn’t even put his foot completely down without it squishing up his toes into a ball. The part that goes around the leg was massive and uncomfortable, and the actual size of the shoe was significantly smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no ice grip like others.
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit my 8yo son well and he said they are warm. The Velcro is super strong so he will probably end up wearing them loose so he can slip them on. I think younger kids would have a hard time with the closure. The soles are really sturdy BUT they do not have the ice grip like others mentioned. I wondered if schools would let kids wear them like that but my son was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors, Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors. My son likes the warmth although we haven't had a huge snow yet to fully test them out. I thought they would be a bit bigger as I ordered 2 sizes bigger than what he wears but he only has about 1/2 inch of room and I thought there'd be more. So far, they are good and he doesn't need extra thick socks. He loves wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Neat

customer_reviews.title: Beware...Do not waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed! These boots are not even worth $20. The boots arrived in a bag- not a shoe box, the boots inside the bag are smooshed and bent up and the now creased fabric is starting to split. This is not the greatest picture, I will try to add more.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, they are great!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these boots that I bought my one year old. They are soft all the way down to the toes. They looked a little big when they first arrived but got perfectly, he wears a 6-7 in toddler shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stay closed
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves the camo design. They seem warm without being too heavy and are easy to get on. The velcro is very secure so it seems it will keep the moisture out. True test will be snow play! Will update if they don't work well. Otherwise we seem happy with them! I wish they made them in a smaller size for my littlest.
customer_reviews.author: disneylover427

customer_reviews.title: no build-in ice-cleats for 2019 models
customer_reviews.text: I brought because in review I saw build-in ice-cleats. But looks like they removed it in 2019. Over all it’s good but not as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Dheeraj Dubey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the correct size but could mint be d my kids foot to get it in the booth without him screaming. Bought another brand that works.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and warm. Seem good quality. Haven’t worn out in the snow yet to see how they hold up in the snow. Ordered a 9.5 for my 5 yr old. They seem a little narrow so if your child have wide feet, may not work or passably order a size up?
customer_reviews.author: melm

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boots, but no ice cleats
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today. Really like them. My son says they are comfy. He wears size one in shoe, but went with the 2.5. Little big but not much just how I like them. Only down side is that they did not come with the snow cleats like everyone’s else’s did. We got the blue pair. Really wish they did since MT gets lots of snow and ice bad. Otherwise a great snowboot! Giving 4 star for no ice cleats and haven’t been tested in the snow yet. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Mamma bear

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: These boots rock!! What great quality for the price!!! I have gone to stores and got poor quality for a steeper price! My kids love them, they are super soft and warm inside. Only issue is they run a little small so order one size up at least
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my son thinks the boots are too tight on the sides
customer_reviews.text: The size fits in length, and the the boots feel comfy but apparently they are tight on the sides.my son has normal feet and is very slim overall. i will probably give them to my younger son, who has a smaller shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Reiterer

customer_reviews.title: Ice-Cleat Is Too Loud In Normal Use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off. Stylish. But I didn't realize they came with ice-cleats on the bottom. This makes it a horrible cold weather boot as you are hearing the metal cleat hit the floor with every step; like taps for tap dancing shoes - its that loud. If you have many days where there would be ice on the ground, then maybe this boot is for you. If you are looking for a cold weather boot that you could wear when it snows, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job of keeping feet dry and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son for Christmas to take back East to visit my mom in North Carolina. He ended up not needing them out there but we had a nice almost week long rain here in So Cal (surprise for us since we hardly ever get that much rain at once!) and he wore these to school. The furry inside kept his feet nice and warm and they kept his feet/socks dry too! They def get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: S. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Boston winter and five year old
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old. He loves them and says his feet stay warm in freezing Boston winter. He likes to wear them at every opportunity...read 25F or below. Good product and value for money. Will buy again next year.
customer_reviews.author: V. Gorantla

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, fur on the inside and super cute. Only downside was the color it looks white in the photo but it’s a cream color. I’m going to keep them because that doesn’t bother me much. Just wasn’t the color I expected. I got a 7 for my 23 month old twins. Spent a lot of time looking at reviews for the perfect reviews and these were the best I found. So hopefully this helps when buying your boots.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my son who was going on a fishing trip below freezing. Living in a mild climate, I didn’t want to spend a lot. He said his feet were warm and comfortable the whole time. He says they’re awesome and he never put on his normal shoes the entire trip! Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Hauck

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and warm! Love these! A bit clunky, and I did have to trim the Velcro at the top because it pokes through to my kids legs which would hurt. I just use mail clippers to get out really well. These are very nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Jady

customer_reviews.title: Great boot - only lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: These boots came flattened in the box they were shipped in. The cardboard that was inserted in the boots did not help keep their shape. These boots are not water proof....only water resistant. Meaning, if your child does not put his/her snow pants over the boots, their feet will get wet. The boots fit as expected by the size chart and lasted the winter! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially were very nice but after only a couple of months the bottom is coming off and my sons feet were drenched every time he wore them not worth the money spent ....
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: NOT A SNOW BOOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT SNOW BOOTS!!! 30min IN THE SNOW AND MY SONS FEET WHERE COLD, (WEARING SNOW GEAR) TOOK THEM OFF AND WHERE ALL WET... AGAIN NOT SNOW BOOTS JUST ANOTHER FASHION WANNABE SNOW BOOT...
customer_reviews.author: Erick MnM

customer_reviews.title: Great Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves these so much that he wears them in every weather condition. He seems to be able to run and jump and play in these as if he was wearing sneakers. I really like how the inside is lined with a soft furry material. Overall a very nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wixy Vale

customer_reviews.title: Wet, soggy, nasty, wrinkly feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Michigan, and we get a lot of snow.... my sons feet were so wet the first time he wore them to school his feet were a wrinkly soggy mess. Would never buy again. I’m purchasing some totes ASAP in his size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy boots
customer_reviews.text: My son loves anything cozy and by his expert-4-year-old-opinion these are the best. If you have a child who loves cozy things then these will be winning pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and well made. This is actually the second pair I’ve bought. Bought them last year and my child outgrew them. Loved them so much, I ordered the same sones, just the next size up this year.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm and comfortable, the only reason they get any stars. They are NOT waterproof by any means! Not what we expected on a snow trip.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Product was great
customer_reviews.text: The product was great but the top of the boot is so wide open that snow will get inside. I bought a 5 for a foot size that is a 4 and they were a good fit. If the top was not so wide open I would have thought these were a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My boot
customer_reviews.text: Fuzzy warm food for small feat my son explains they are comfortable and he wants to wear them every day could not ask for a better boot feet stay dry and warm
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These were great. Fit true to size for both my boys and they complained that their feet were hot/sweaty. So definitely kept them warm in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son for the upcoming winter. Easy for him to put on and take off. He has worn them quite a bit and has never complained about cold feet. Haven’t used them too much in snow yet but we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Bozzy311

customer_reviews.title: 2nd year in these boots
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots. Only thing we would change is the ice gripper on the bottom. We RARELY flip it out to use it on the ice but even with it tucked into the boot it makes a clicking noise with each step he takes on hard floors (like in school). Oh well. Not a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: sd3

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but too large. Think they sent the wrong size or they're just not true to fit
customer_reviews.author: pam adams

customer_reviews.title: Can handle the snow
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old tested these boots out today in about a foot of snow. Kept his feet dry and he didnt complain about his feet being cold like he did with other boots. Super easy to put a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Poy

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot but way too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 10 and they were so narrow and my toddler could not get his foot in there. I recommend going up a size or two larger. Boot was nice but we couldn't use since they were so small. They almost fit like a girls narrow 10.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: We like them
customer_reviews.text: We use them everyday and we live in Las Vegas. He wears them to ride his motorcycle and to watch his brothers swim outdoors every night.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My kid wears them, they’re waterproof and warm. Is there anything else??!! Figured it was a crap shoot buying boots online. At four, kid can put them on and off by self. They’re soft inside. Mom’s dream!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Mom

customer_reviews.title: They're narrow!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are true to size in length but are very narrow. They look very warm but I doubt they're waterproof. I'll be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: sara berns

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Boots were a lil bigger than expected but did the job. Snow/ rain boots for my 7 year old and he loved how easy to put on it is.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: These boots are true to size, and warm, but they’re kind of short and wide. There is a lot of room on the shins in between the boot, and the legs, so snow can get it easily. You can’t adjust them to be tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Daly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic quality. I love how soft and snug the inside is, keeping her feet dry and warm. The velcro made them super easy to get off and on. Our favorite snow boots!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!!! Great for snow!
customer_reviews.text: Great for snow!!!! My child enjoy them So much on his trip to New York, price is good and good quality boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and is always excited to put them on, they have kept his feet dry and warm in our heavy snow winters here in SD. Would definitely buy again and recommend to friends. Lots of compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Soft inside and warm. My 7 year old wants to wear them all the time even if there is no snow. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: order up a size
customer_reviews.text: Order up a size runs short in the length from toe to heel. Otherwise nice boots.
customer_reviews.author: luebke9000@fvtc.edu

customer_reviews.title: For the money these boots are great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for my boys & both fit perfect. Because I read other reviews & all said order half to a full size larger than their feet are. They were correct! They are of good quality, near as we can tell, no snow yet.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Easy Velcro on-off design
customer_reviews.text: My toddler was able to put shoes on and off with ease and loves it. It is very warm inside the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Clari

customer_reviews.title: Good price shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price shoddy quality. But two pairs of these boots one was good but the other one fell apart as soon as I used it. The velcro on the boot that's used to fasten peeled right off the boot after first Contact not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Danny S. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the boots for my toddler grandson and my daughter says they are not only adorable but fit him well! She loves them, he likes wearing them (and playing with them) so everyone is happy! Good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie V.

customer_reviews.title: Warm school shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great winter shoes. My son loves them. If you are looking for cold weather snow boots this is a great find. Good price too. Fits true to the size. My son has a wide foot so this was lucky,- good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya2012

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loves these boots. He wants to wear them even when it’s not snowing because he loves how comfortable they are. He wears a 4.5 and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler snow boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are excellent! The Velcro makes it very easy to slip on a squirmy toddler. The inside is lined with faux fur which is so cozy and warm! The boots have sneaker like bottoms which makes for excellent traction. Look no further and get these boots! Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and durable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the best! This is the second pair we got my son. They are warm, sturdy, and grip well on ice! Also they are ready to get on!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Lee

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My kid wears a 13.5 I ordered a size 1 and it is to small. I will be ordering a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: There’s really no way to tighten the boot around the ankle. Those buckles are just for looks, they don’t actually tighten. These boots are super cute, but unfortunately they’re going back today.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My son wears them to school almost every day in the winter, they’ve held up well and he can get them on and off himself.
customer_reviews.author: E. Locher

customer_reviews.title: Girl boots that fit toddler girls and make them so happy
customer_reviews.text: They were the cutest little boots on my granddaughter! Her three brothers each got new boots and so did she! She is a busy toddler keeping up with her older brothers!
customer_reviews.author: pat dufner

customer_reviews.title: Warm waterproof great quality great  price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Warm and nice quality! They keep his feet warm and dry in the snow and rain! Great looking too so I would definitely buy again and I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer higby

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, at the bottom has metal things to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, at the bottom has metal things to pull out so the child doesn’t fall on ice or snow. Overall good quality, water proof. Very easy to clean/wash. Nice colors and priced reasonably. Has a warm fur inside. My kids and I loved these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: He says his feet are really warm in snow. He walks about 1/4 of a mile to and from school.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Mason

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are so perfect. I love them, my son love them, they are cozy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Craciun

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and good boots - happy kids
customer_reviews.text: Ski trip and kids are growing so had to get a new pair. They love it very comfortable and warm. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: can.i.tell.you.something

customer_reviews.title: Fit well sturdy
customer_reviews.text: That are warren ave good quality. They have been rubbing just a little in my . But in told him to tuck his pants in and they have been good since.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old son. They fit as expected. Super warm and soft inside.
customer_reviews.author: jocloud

customer_reviews.title: Quality Boot.
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely nice boots and there is a feature that my great nephew found immediately on the bottom of the boot - a little switch that brings out an ice "thingy" that makes them an ice snow boot. Really different. He really liked that. I initially bought the wrong size and that was my error. I ordered the right size and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I recommend buying one size bigger. Very snug, warm, waterproof. Missing the metal piece for ice/snow. Very cute and perfect for Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Son LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and cozy boots! Son loves them. I sized up one from what he wears.
customer_reviews.author: Mom/Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Durable Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Grear snow boot for kids. They are not only durable, but provide excellent protection from the snow. My son loves wearing these which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson and he went out and played in the snow for about an hour. Came back in and had to strip his socks off his feet were very warm
customer_reviews.author: igotmilk44

customer_reviews.title: Not for snow
customer_reviews.text: These "winter" boots are useless, water attracting sponges. Worthless in snow.
customer_reviews.author: G. DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...great value!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected and are very soft on the inside. They hold up to the snow and keep my 8 year old son's feet warm. I highly recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: They work fine for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price and my kids grow out of them so fast they work fine
customer_reviews.author: Country railroader

customer_reviews.title: Nice snow boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson for the snow. My daughter loves these and they fit really nice. I recommend these boot.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what we expected. Are NOT water proof, my daughter has to bring extra socks to school as her feet get soaked from the snow. Reminds me of having to use bread bags with my boots as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: iastudent

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is the color my son wanted, fits perfectly, he said they are comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Wv Momma

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time wearing the new boots in the snow, feet got soaked. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

product_meta.title: BODATU Boys Snow Boots Outdoor Waterproof Winter Kids Shoes
feature_bullets: Textured outsole offer perfect slip resistance
Boy's snow boot with faux fur lining to keep feet warm
Waterproof textile and synthetic upper to keep feet dry
Power hook and loop closure for adjustable fit
NOTE: please check foot length in size chart before ordering
